conversation.content: Um, hi, I'm I'm calling about a venue deposit? I know I know this is probably, uh, a nightmare for you guys too.
Let me just, um... okay so I'm pulling up the—hmm, venue deposits, that's... Right. So, uh, I need your confirmation number, it should be, er, something like VEN and then, um, six digits?
It's it's VEN-882749. The wedding got cancelled last minute.
VEN-882749, okay so, um, let me just... hmm, I see here that's for—wait, no that's... sorry, I mean the Rosewood Gardens booking? And, uh, this was supposed to be for, er, next weekend?
Yeah yeah, exactly. I just—I just really need this sorted out.
Right. So, um, looking at VEN-882749 here and, uh, the system shows—hmm, let me think... okay so there's a cancellation request but, er, it's stuck in processing?
Oh no, um, is that—I mean, uh, that's fixable right? I'm I'm sorry, I know you're just, um, doing your job here.
No no, it's... Look, I get it. Let me see here... The refund for VEN-882749 needs manager approval when it's, um, this close to the date. But your case reference is, uh, REF-20240315-K.
Okay okay, um, so like, how long does that usually, uh, take? I'm just—I'm just stressed about the whole thing.
Got it.
Sorry, I don't I don't mean to be, um, you know, difficult or anything.

You're not being—I mean, um, this is... hmm, totally understandable. So, uh, with REF-20240315-K, normally it's 3-5 days but, er, let me check if there's—wait, actually, um, I might be able to escalate this.
Really? That would be—that would be amazing.
Okay so... hmm, what if I... Your original transaction ID was TXN-447291-BX, and since it's, um, a cancelled event not a, er, voluntary cancellation... Yeah. I can push this through.
Oh my god, um, thank you so much, I just, uh, you have no idea how much this helps.
Absolutely.
I bet I bet you deal with, um, people way angrier than me all day, uh, and here I am just, you know, adding to it.

Actually you're... hmm, you're one of the nicer ones today. So your refund with, um, tracking number RFD-882749-QM2 should process in, er, 24 to 48 hours instead of—wait, let me confirm—yeah, 48 hours max.
You're you're literally saving my week here. Thank you.
It's gonna be okay. The system shows everything's, um, approved now under RFD-882749-QM2, and you'll get an email when it's—I mean, once it hits your account. Take care.
